modName: Elven Armor -  Dominion Elite Guard Retex
summary: Cleaner and elegant retexture of the Elven Armor
descriptionHtml:
A clean and elegant retexture of cmdo\'s [url=\"http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=634\"]Moonstone Elven Armour and Weapons[/url]. 

I always thought that the Elven Armor had an old and battered look that didn\'t match the appearance of a newly crafted piece of armor... actually it looked like you just looted it from a flooded dungeon and you just had to remove the decaying corpse of the previous owner from inside the pieces.

The retex made by cmdo was an excelent approach to what I think the armor should look, but I missed the golden look of the original. Then, using cmdo\'s retex, I played a little with colours and saturation, and the result is this: A clean, golden armor with black leather and red fabric details. Simple yet elegant, and also the weapons textures saturation was changed to match the armor.

I really hope you like it ;)
author: VanSchroding

files.name: Elven Armor Dominion Elite Guard Retex
